278 - Zaid bin Sallam. ... 279 - And Muawiyah bin Sallam.
280 - Zaid bin Abdul Rahman bin Ma'mar. ... 281 - And Abdullah bin Abdul Rahman. 282 - And Uqbah bin Abdul Rahman.
Letter Sin
283 - Salim bin Sarj. ... 284 - And Nafi' bin Sarj.
foot_note:
1. 276 - Ibn Hibban said in *Al-Thiqat* 6/318: Mawla of Rabi'ah, from the people of Basra, died in the year 158, and he is the brother of Umar bin Hayyan.
277 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban 6/318 in the biography of his brother, as stated above.
278 - Zaid bin Sallam bin Abi Sallam Mamtor Al-Habashi, trustworthy (Thiqah) from the sixth [generation] / Bukhari, M 4; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/395, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 3/564, *Al-Thiqat* 6/315, *Al-Tahdhib* 3/415. Everyone who wrote his biography from those mentioned above said: The brother of Muawiyah.
279 - Abu Sallam Al-Dimashqi, and he lived in Homs, trustworthy (Thiqah) from the seventh [generation], died around 170 / A; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 7/335, *Al-Jarh* 8/383, *Al-Thiqat* 7/469, *Al-Tahdhib* 10/208. Everyone who wrote his biography from those mentioned above said: He narrates from his brother Zaid.
280 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in *Al-Thiqat* 6/313; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/400, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 3/567. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Uqbah and Abdullah. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abu Tuwalah.
281 - Al-Ansari Abu Tuwalah (with Damma on the unpointed letter), Al-Madani, the judge of Medina for Umar bin Abdul Aziz, trustworthy (Thiqah) from the fifth [generation], died in the year 134, and it is said after that / A; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 5/130, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 5/94, *Al-Tahdhib* 6/297.
282 - Unknown (Majhul) from the third [generation] / Q; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 6/435, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 6/314, *Al-Tahdhib* 7/245. Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Abdullah Al-Ansari and Zaid.
283 - Abu Al-Nu'man Al-Madani, it is said: Ibn Kharbudh, and some said Salim bin Al-Nu'man, trustworthy (Thiqah) from the third [generation] / Bukhari, D Q; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 4/113, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/187, *Al-Tahdhib* 3/435.
284 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in *Al-Thiqat* 5/468, and said: Nafi' bin Sarh with Ha', brother of Salim bin Sarh, Mawla of Umm Habibah Al-Juhaniyyah.

book_title: Supplement to What Was Missed Regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
285 - Sabrah bin Abi Sabrah. ... 286 - And Abdul Rahman bin Abi Sabrah.
287 - Suraqah bin Malik. ... 288 - And Malik bin Malik.
289 - Sa'd bin Sa'd Al-Sa'idi. ... 290 - And Sahl bin Sa'd.
291 - Sa'd bin Said bin Abi Said Al-Maqburi. ... 292 - And Abdullah bin Said.
293 - Sa'd bin Ammar bin Sa'd Al-Qaraz. ... 294 - And Muhammad bin Ammar.
foot_note:
1. 285 - His father's name is Yazid bin Malik Al-Ju'fi, he and his brother Abdul Rahman have companionship and delegation [to the Prophet]; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 4/188, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/396, *Al-Isabah* 3/29.
286 - Companion, his name was Aziz, so the Prophet, peace be upon him, named him Abdul Rahman; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 5/241, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 5/238, *Al-Thiqat* 3/252, *Al-Isabah* 4/308, *Ta'jil al-Manfa'ah* 167.
287 - Suraqah bin Malik bin Ju'shum (with Damma on Jim and the pointed letter, and Ayn unpointed between them) Al-Kinani then Al-Mudlaji, Abu Sufyan, a famous Companion from those who became Muslim at the Conquest, died in the Caliphate of Uthman in year 24, and it is said after / Kh 4; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 4/208, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/308, *Usd al-Ghabah* 2/331, *Al-Isabah* 3/41, *Al-Tahdhib* 3/456.
288 - Brother of Suraqah, acceptable (Maqbul), from the second [generation] / Kh Q; Ibn Hibban said in *Al-Thiqat* 5/382: The brother of Suraqah, *Al-Tahdhib* 10/21, *Al-Isabah* 6/275.
289 - Mentioned by Ibn Al-Athir in *Usd al-Ghabah* 2/353, and Al-Hafiz in *Al-Isabah* 3/62. They said: The brother of Sahl.
290 - Al-Khazraji Abu Al-Abbas, he and his father were Companions, famous, exceeded one hundred years / A; *Usd al-Ghabah* 3/473, *Al-Isabah* 3/200, *Al-Tahdhib* 4/252.
291 - Al-Madani Abu Sahl, soft in Hadith (Layyin Al-Hadith) from the eighth [generation] / Q; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 4/56, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/85, *Al-Tahdhib* 3/489. Al-Hafiz said in *Al-Tahdhib*: He narrated from his brother Abdullah.
292 - Abu Abbad Al-Laythi Al-Madani, abandoned (Matruk), from the seventh [generation] / T Q; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 5/105, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 5/71, *Al-Tahdhib* 5/237.
293 - The Muezzin, covered (Mastur) from the sixth [generation] / Q; *Al-Tahdhib* 3/479.
294 - Covered (Mastur) from the fourth [generation] / T; *Al-Thiqat* 5/272, *Al-Tahdhib* 9/358. Al-Hafiz said: His nephew Abdul Rahman bin Sa'd bin Ammar narrated from him.

book_title: Supplement to What Was Missed Regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
295 - Said bin Hatib bin Al-Harith. ... 296 - And Muhammad bin Hatib.
297 - Said bin Khalid bin Abdullah. ... 298 - And Al-Miswar bin Khalid.
299 - Said Khuthaym. ... 300 - And Ma'mar bin Khuthaym.
301 - Said bin Sulaiman bin Zaid bin Thabit. ... 302 - And Abdullah bin Sulaiman.
303 - Said bin Sam'an. ... 304 - And Muslim bin Sam'an.
foot_note:
1. 295 - Mentioned by Al-Hafiz in *Al-Isabah* 3/100 and said: Al-Bukhari mentioned him in *Al-Sahabah*, and Ibn Hibban mentioned him in *Thiqat Al-Tabi'in* 4/277, and said: His companionship is not authentic to me. Ibn Hibban and Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Muhammad bin Hatib.
296 - Al-Jumahi Al-Kufi, differed over his nickname, a young Companion, died in the year 74 / T S Q; *Usd al-Ghabah* 5/85, *Al-Isabah* 6/8, *Al-Tahdhib* 9/106.
297 - Al-Kinani Al-Madani, ally of Banu Zuhra, truthful (Saduq) from the third [generation] / D S Q; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/469, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/16, *Al-Thiqat* 6/357, *Al-Tahdhib* 4/20. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Al-Miswar.
298 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his *Tarikh* 7/410, and Ibn Abi Hatim in *Al-Jarh* 8/398. They said: The brother of Said bin Khalid.
299 - Said bin Khuthaym (with pointed letter and unpointed letter, diminutive) bin Rashad (with Fatha on Ra' and pointed letter) Al-Hilali, Abu Ma'mar Al-Kufi, truthful (Saduq) accused of Shi'ism, has errors, from the ninth [generation], died in the year 108 / T S; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/470, *Al-Jarh* 4/17, *Al-Thiqat* 6/359, *Al-Tahdhib* 4/22. Everyone who wrote his biography from those mentioned above said he narrated from his brother Ma'mar.
300 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his *Tarikh* 7/379, and Ibn Abi Hatim in *Al-Jarh* 8/259, and said: His brother Said narrated from him.
301 - Al-Ansari Al-Madani, its judge, trustworthy (Thiqah) from the sixth [generation] / Bukhari; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/481, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/25, *Al-Thiqat* 6/350, *Al-Tahdhib* 4/42. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abdullah.
302 - Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Said; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 5/109, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 5/74, *Al-Thiqat* 5/8.
303 - Al-Ansari Al-Zuraqi, their Mawla, Al-Madani, trustworthy (Thiqah). Al-Azdi was incorrect in weakening him, from the third [generation] / R D T S; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/479, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/30, *Al-Thiqat* 4/278, *Al-Tahdhib* 4/45.
304 - Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Said bin Sam'an; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 7/262, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* =

book_title: Supplement to What Was Missed Regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
305 - Said bin Abdul Aziz Al-Tanukhi. ... 306 - And Yazid bin Abdul Aziz.
307 - Said bin Abdul Malik bin Marwan. ... 308 - And Sulaiman. ... 309 - And Maslamah. 310 - And Hisham, Al-Walid, and Yazid.
311 - Said bin Ubaydullah Al-Thaqafi. ... 312 - And Mughirah bin Ubaydullah.
313 - Said bin Masruq Al-Kindi. ... 314 - And Muhammad bin Masruq.
foot_note:
1. = 8/184, *Al-Thiqat* 5/395.
305 - Al-Dimashqi, trustworthy Imam (Thiqah Imam), Ahmad equated him with Al-Awza'i, became confused (Ikhtalata) at the end of his life, died in the year 167, and it is said later, and he was seventy-something / Bukhari M 4; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/497, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/42, *Al-Thiqat* 6/369, *Al-Tahdhib* 4/59.
306 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in *Al-Thiqat* 7/619 and said: The brother of Said, and he was older than Said and died before him.
307 - Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Sulaiman, Yazid, and Al-Walid. Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Sulaiman and Yazid; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/497, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/44, *Al-Thiqat* 6/369.
308 - Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Said, Muhammad, Yazid, Hisham, Al-Walid, and Maslamah; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 4/25, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/131.
309 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 8/266, and Ibn Hibban in *Al-Thiqat* 7/490.
310 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his *Tarikh* 8/195. Basim said: Hisham, Al-Walid, and Yazid; they have no narration, and Allah knows best.
311 - Said bin Ubaydullah bin Jubayr bin Hayyah (with unpointed letter and Ya') Al-Jubayri (with Damma on Jim), Basri, truthful (Saduq) perhaps hallucinates, from the sixth [generation] / Kh T S Q; *Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir* 3/495, *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/38, *Al-Thiqat* 6/363, 372, *Al-Tahdhib* 4/61.
312 - Acceptable (Maqbul) from the seventh [generation] / S; *Al-Thiqat* 7/464, *Al-Tahdhib* 10/267. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Said bin Ubaydullah.
313 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 4/66; and said: The brother of Muhammad bin Masruq, the Judge of Egypt.
314 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in *Al-Jarh wat-Ta'dil* 8/104.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 315 - Sa'id ibn Yasar. ... 316 - And Abu Muzarrad. 317 - Salamah ibn al-Sa'ib al-Kalbi. ... 318 - And Muhammad ibn al-Sa'ib al-Kalbi. 319 - Salamah ibn Yasar. ... 320 - And Abd Allah ibn Yasar. ... 321 - And Muhammad ibn Yasar. 322 - And Salim ibn Hurmuz. ... 323 - And Muslim ibn Hurmuz. 324 - Sulayman ibn Kharijah ibn Zayd. ... 325 - And Abd Allah ibn Kharijah.
foot_note:
1. 315 - Abu al-Hubab (with Damma on the unpointed letter [Ha]), Al-Madani. There is disagreement regarding whom his loyalty [Wala'] belonged to; it was said Sa'id ibn Murjanah, but this is incorrect. He is Thiqah (trustworthy), Mutqin (precise). He died in the year one hundred and seventeen, and it was said a year before that. / 'A (The Group); Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 3/520, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/72, Al-Thiqat 4/279, Al-Tahdhib 4/102. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abu Muzarrad.
316 - Abu Muzarrad (with Tashdid on the Ra after the Zay). His name is Abd al-Rahman ibn Yasar, and he is the father of Mu'awiyah. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the third [generation]. / Bukh (Al-Bukhari in Adab al-Mufrad); Al-Tahdhib 12/233. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Abu al-Hubab Sa'id ibn Yasar.
317 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/163, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 6/401, and they said: His brother Muhammad ibn al-Sa'ib al-Kalbi narrated from him.
318 - Abu al-Nadr, Al-Kufi, the Genealogist and Exegete. Accused of lying and accused of Rafd (rejection/Shi'ism). From the sixth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and forty-six. / T, Fq; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/101, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/270, Al-Mizan 3/566, Al-Tahdhib 9/178.
319 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother Muhammad in Al-Thiqat by Ibn Hibban 7/429 as will follow.
320 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother Muhammad as will follow.
321 - Al-Khurasani. Saduq (Truthful). From the seventh [generation]. / 'A, Kh, S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/268, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/130, Al-Thiqat 7/429, Al-Tahdhib 9/532. Ibn Hibban said: They are three brothers: Muhammad ibn Yasar, Salamah ibn Yasar, and Abd Allah ibn Yasar, from Marw, all are Thiqah (trustworthy).
322 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 4/130, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 4/213, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 4/331, and he said: His nephew Abd Allah ibn Muslim ibn Hurmuz narrated from him.
323 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/198, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/399, and he said: His son Abd Allah ibn Muslim ibn Hurmuz narrated from him.
324 - Al-Ansari Al-Madani. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the sixth [generation]. / T, M; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/9, Al-Thiqat 6/388, Al-Tahdhib 4/182. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abd Allah ibn Kharijah.
325 - Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Sulayman; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/79, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/45, Al-Thiqat 7/32.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 326 - And Abd al-Rahman ibn Kharijah. 327 - Sinan ibn Abi Sinan. ... 328 - And Al-Haytham ibn Abi Sinan. 329 - Sinan ibn Harun al-Burjumi. ... 330 - And Sayf ibn Harun. 331 - Sahl ibn Muzahim. ... 332 - And Muhammad ibn Muzahim al-Amiri. 333 - Sayf ibn Muhammad. ... 334 - And Ammar ibn Muhammad.
foot_note:
1. 326 - Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abd Allah and Sulayman; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/278, Al-Jarh 5/231, Al-Thiqat 7/75.
327 - Al-Dili, Al-Madani. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the third [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and five. / Kh, M, T, S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/163, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/252, Al-Thiqat 4/336, Al-Tahdhib 4/242.
328 - Al-Madani. Saduq (Truthful), from the fourth [generation]. / Kh; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/212, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/79, Al-Thiqat 5/507, Al-Tahdhib 11/98. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Sinan ibn Abi Sinan.
329 - Abu Bishr, Al-Kufi. Saduq (Truthful) with some softness [leniancy/weakness], from the eighth [generation]. / T; Al-Tabaqat Al-Kubra 6/387, Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/166, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/253, Al-Tahdhib 4/243. Ibn Sa'd, Al-Bukhari, and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Sayf.
330 - Abu al-Warqa', Al-Kufi. Da'if (Weak), Ibn Hibban spoke very harshly about him. From the younger ones of the eighth [generation]. / T, Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/172, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/276, Al-Majruhin 1/346, Al-Tahdhib 4/297.
331 - Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Muzahim; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/204, Al-Thiqat 8/289.
332 - Al-Amiri, their Mawla, Abu Wahb al-Marwazi. Saduq (Truthful), from the elders of the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and nine. / T; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/228, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/90, Al-Tahdhib 9/437. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Sahl ibn Muzahim.
333 - Al-Kufi, the nephew (sister's son) of Sufyan al-Thawri. He settled in Baghdad. They called him a liar. From the younger ones of the eighth [generation]. He died around the year one hundred and ninety. / T; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/172, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/277, Al-Majruhin 1/346, Al-Tahdhib 4/296. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Ammar ibn Muhammad.
334 - Al-Thawri, Abu al-Yaqzan, Al-Kufi, the nephew (sister's son) of Sufyan al-Thawri. He lived in Baghdad. Saduq (Truthful) but makes mistakes, and he was a worshipper. From the eighth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and eighty-two. / M, T, Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/29, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/393, Al-Tahdhib 7/405.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
The Letter Shin
335 - Shahin ibn Hayyan al-Nahshali. ... 336 - And Fahd ibn Hayyan. 337 - Shabib ibn Ajlan. ... 338 - And Salim ibn Abi al-Dhayyal. 339 - Shu'ayb ibn al-Fadl. ... 340 - And Arim ibn al-Fadl. 341 - Shihab ibn Kharash ibn Hawshab. ... 342 - And Abd Allah ibn Kharash.
The Letter Sad
343 - Salih ibn al-Durays. ... 344 - And Yahya ibn al-Durays.
foot_note:
1. 335 - Abu Hatim said: Da'if (Weak); Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/392, Al-Thiqat 8/314, Al-Lisan 3/136. Ibn Abi Hatim and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Fahd.
336 - Ali ibn al-Madini said: His hadith is gone. Abu Hatim said: Weak in hadith; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/88, Al-Majruhin 2/210, Al-Lisan 4/454.
337 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 8/311 and he said: The brother of Salim ibn Abi al-Dhayyal.
338 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother in Al-Thiqat as previously cited.
339 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/351 and he said: The brother of Arim ibn al-Fadl, then he said: I asked my father about him? He said: He died before our arrival; we have heard nothing bad about him.
340 - Mentioned in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil in the biography of his brother as previously cited.
341 - Al-Shaybani, Abu al-Salt, Al-Wasiti, the nephew (brother's son) of Al-Awwam ibn Hawshab. He settled in Kufa. He is mentioned in the Introduction of Muslim. Saduq (Truthful) but makes mistakes, from the seventh [generation]. / D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/236, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/362, Al-Tahdhib 4/366.
342 - Abu Ja'far, Al-Kufi. Da'if (Weak) and Ibn Ammar applied the term 'lying' to him. He died after the year one hundred and sixty. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/80, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/40, Al-Tahdhib 5/197. Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Shihab ibn Kharash. It appears in Al-Tahdhib as: The brother of Nahar ibn Kharash, which is a misspelling (Tashif), and Allah knows best.
343 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/406, and he said: The brother of Yahya ibn al-Durays.
344 - Al-Durays (with a pointed letter then a diminutive unpointed one), Al-Bajali, Al-Razi, the Judge. Saduq (Truthful), from the ninth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and three. / M, T; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/282, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/158, Al-Tahdhib 11/232.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
345 - Salih ibn Ubayd Allah ibn Abi Rafi'. ... 346 - And Abd Allah ibn Ubayd Allah. 347 - And Muhammad ibn Ubayd Allah. 348 - Salih ibn Qudamah ibn Ibrahim. ... 349 - And Abd al-Malik ibn Qudamah. 350 - Sadaqah ibn Abd Allah ibn Kathir. ... 351 - And Abd al-Hamid ibn Abd Allah.
The Letter Dad
352 - Al-Dahhak ibn Qays ibn Khalid. ... 353 - And Fatima bint Qays.
foot_note:
1. 345 - Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Abd Allah; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/285, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/407, Al-Thiqat 6/461.
346 - Al-Madani, Mawla of Banu Hashim. Maqbul (Acceptable), from the sixth [generation]. His hearing from his grandfather is not proven. / M, S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/138, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/100, Al-Tahdhib 5/305.
347 - Al-Kufi. Da'if (Weak) from the sixth [generation]. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/171, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/2, Al-Tahdhib 9/321.
348 - Al-Qurashi, Al-Jumahi, Al-Madani. Maqbul (Acceptable), from the eighth [generation]. / S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/288, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/410, Al-Thiqat 6/462, Al-Tahdhib 4/398. Al-Bukhari said: He narrated from his brother Abd al-Malik.
349 - Al-Madani. Da'if (Weak) from the seventh [generation]. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/428, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/362, Al-Tahdhib 6/414. Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Salih.
350 - Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the Qurashi, the Meccan, the brother of Abd al-Hamid; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/296, Al-Jarh 4/433, Al-Thiqat 6/468.
351 - Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Sadaqah. Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Sadaqah. Ibn Hibban said: I reckon him to be the brother of Sadaqah; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/51, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/14, Al-Thiqat 7/122.
352 - Al-Fihri, Abu Anis, the famous Emir. A junior Companion. He was killed in the Battle of Marj Rahit in the year sixty-four. / S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/332, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/457, Al-Isabah 3/478, Al-Tahdhib 4/448. Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Fatima.
353 - The sister of Al-Dahhak. A famous female Companion, she was among the early emigrants (Muhajirat), and she lived until the Caliphate of Mu'awiyah. / 'A; Usd al-Ghabah 7/230, Al-Isabah 8/69, Al-Tahdhib 12/443. Al-Hafiz said: The sister of Al-Dahhak.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
354 - Al-Dahhak ibn Muzahim al-Hilali. ... 355 - And Muhammad ibn Muzahim.
The Letter Ta'
356 - Al-Tufayl ibn Sakhbarah. ... 357 - The brother of Aisha, Mother of the Believers, through her mother.
The Letter 'Ayn
358 - Asim ibn Raja' ibn Haywah. ... 359 - And Kamil ibn Raja'. 360 - Asim ibn Sufyan. ... 361 - And Abd Allah ibn Sufyan. ... 362 - And Amr ibn Sufyan.
foot_note:
1. 354 - Abu al-Qasim or Abu Muhammad, Al-Khurasani. Saduq (Truthful), Kathir al-Irsal (frequently narrates with broken chains), from the fifth [generation]. He died after the [year one] hundred; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/332, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/458, Al-Tahdhib 4/453.
355 - The brother of Al-Dahhak. Matruk (Abandoned) from the seventh [generation]. / Tamyiz; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/227, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/90, Al-Thiqat 7/428, Al-Tahdhib 9/438. Everyone who wrote his biography among those mentioned previously said: The brother of Al-Dahhak.
356 - Al-Tufayl ibn Sakhbarah, and it is said: Ibn Abd Allah ibn al-Harith ibn Sakhbarah (with Fatha and Sukun on the unpointed letter, then Ba'). The brother of Aisha through her mother. A Companion who has hadith. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 4/489, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 4/363, Usd al-Ghabah 3/77, Al-Isabah 4/520, Al-Tahdhib 5/14.
357 - Preceded.
358 - Al-Kindi, Al-Filastini. Saduq (Truthful) but hallucinates [makes mistakes], from the eighth [generation]. / D, T, Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/488, Al-Jarh 6/342, Al-Tahdhib 5/41.
359 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/359, and he said: The brother of Asim ibn Raja'.
360 - Asim ibn Sufyan ibn Abd Allah al-Thaqafi. Saduq (Truthful) from the third [generation]. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/479, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/344, Al-Thiqat 5/236, Al-Tahdhib 5/240. Everyone who wrote his biography among those mentioned previously said: The brother of Abd Allah.
361 - Al-Nasa'i declared him Thiqah (Trustworthy), from the third [generation]. / S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/100, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/66, Al-Thiqat 5/31, Al-Tahdhib 5/41. Ibn Abi Hatim and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Asim and Amr ibn Sufyan. Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Asim.
362 - Maqbul (Acceptable) from the sixth [generation]. / S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/334, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/234, Al-Thiqat 5/176, Al-Tahdhib 8/40. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Asim =

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 363 - Asim ibn al-Mundhir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam. ... 364 - And Abd Allah ibn Mundhir. 365 - And Muhammad. ... 366 - And Fatima. 367 - Amir ibn Abi Umayyah. ... 368 - And Umm Salamah, Mother of the Believers. 369 - Abbad ibn Kunasa. ... 370 - And Muhammad ibn Kunasa. 371 - Abbad ibn Mansur. ... 372 - And Yahya ibn Mansur.
foot_note:
1. = and Abd Allah. It appeared in Al-Jarh: The father of Asim and Abd Allah, which is a mistake. The correct is: The brother of Asim and Abd Allah.
363 - Al-Asadi, Al-Madani. Saduq (Truthful) from the fourth [generation]. / D, Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/492, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/350, Al-Thiqat 7/256, Al-Tahdhib 5/57. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Fatima bint al-Mundhir.
364 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother Muhammad in Al-Thiqat 7/405 where Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abd Allah ibn al-Mundhir.
365 - Ibn Hibban said: He narrates Mursal and Maqati' reports, and he is the brother of Abd Allah ibn al-Mundhir; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/243, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/97, Al-Thiqat 7/405, Al-Ta'jil 249.
366 - The wife of Hisham ibn Urwah. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the third [generation]. / 'A; Al-Thiqat 5/301, Al-Tahdhib 12/444.
367 - His father's name: Hudhayfah, and it is said: Suhayl ibn al-Mughirah ibn Abd Allah ibn Umar ibn Makhzum al-Qurashi. He has companionship (Suhba). He narrated only from his sister. / S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/450, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/319, Al-Thiqat 5/187, Al-Tahdhib 5/61. Everyone who wrote his biography among those mentioned previously said: The brother of Umm Salamah, Mother of the Believers.
268 - Her name is Hind. The Prophet (PBUH) married her after Abu Salamah in the year four, or it is said three. She lived for sixty years after that. She died in the year sixty-two, or it is said sixty-one. / 'A; Usd al-Ghabah 7/340, Al-Isabah 8/221, Al-Tahdhib 12/455.
369 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 8/435 and he said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Kunasa.
370 - He is Muhammad ibn Abd Allah ibn Abd al-A'la, Al-Asadi, Abu Yahya ibn Kunasa (with Damma on the Kaf), which is a nickname for his father or grandfather. Saduq (Truthful), knowledgeable in literature (Adab). From the ninth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and seven, approaching ninety years of age. / S; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/303, Al-Tahdhib 9/259.
371 - Al-Naji, Abu Salamah, Al-Basri, the Judge there. Saduq (Truthful), accused of Qadariyyah, used to practice Tadlis, and changed at the end of his life. From the sixth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and fifty-two. / Kh T, 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/39, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/86, Al-Tahdhib 5/103.
372 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/603, and he said: The brother of Abbad ibn Mansur, he narrates Maqati' reports, =

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 373 - Abbas ibn Nafi'. ... 374 - And Abu Marhab. 375 - Abd Allah ibn Abi Ishaq. ... 376 - And Yahya ibn Abi Ishaq. 377 - Abd Allah ibn Abi Bakr al-Muqaddami. ... 378 - And Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr. 379 - Abd Allah ibn Abi Labid. ... 380 - And Abd al-Rahman ibn Abi Labid. 381 - Abd Allah ibn al-Harith ibn Abd Allah ibn Ayyash. ... 382 - And Abd al-Rahman ibn al-Harith.
foot_note:
1. = and was one of the people of literature and poetry; Al-Lisan 6/278.
373 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari 7/6, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 6/211, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/260, and they said: The brother of Abu Marhab.
374 - Abu Marhab or Marhab. His companionship is disputed. / D; Usd al-Ghabah 6/383, Al-Tahdhib 10/84.
375 - He is Ibn Zayd ibn al-Harith al-Hadrami, Al-Basri, the Grammarian. Saduq (Truthful) from the fifth [generation]. / Q D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/43, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/4, Al-Tahdhib 5/148. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Yahya.
376 - The Grammarian. Saduq (Truthful), perhaps makes mistakes. From the fifth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and thirty-six. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/259, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/125, Al-Thiqat 5/524, Al-Tahdhib 11/177. Ibn Hibban said: He is the brother of Abd Allah ibn Abi Ishaq.
377 - Weakened by Ibn Adi. Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 8/357, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/18, Al-Lisan 3/263. Abu Hatim said: His brother Muhammad is more trustworthy than him, but this is questionable. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Muhammad.
378 - Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr ibn Ali ibn Ata' ibn Muqaddam, Al-Muqaddami (with Tashdid), Abu Abd Allah al-Thaqafi, their Mawla, Al-Basri. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and thirty-four. / Kh M S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/49, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/213, Al-Tahdhib 9/79.
379 - Al-Kufi. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the third [generation]. / Tamyiz; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/182, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/148, Al-Thiqat 5/46, Al-Tahdhib 5/372. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abd al-Rahman ibn Abi Labid.
380 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/104; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/342, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/280.
381 - Ibn Abi Rabi'ah al-Makhzumi al-Qurashi. Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/66, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/32, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/32, and they said: The brother of Abd al-Rahman.
382 - Ibn Ma'in said about him: Salih (Good/Acceptable). Abu Hatim said: Shaykh (An elder/Teacher); Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/271, Al-Jarh

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 383 - Abd Allah ibn Ruman. ... 384 - And Yazid ibn Ruman. 385 - Abd Allah ibn Sa'd ibn Ibrahim. ... 386 - And Ubayd Allah ibn Sa'd. 387 - And Abd Allah ibn Sa'id ibn Aban. ... 388 - And Ubayd Allah. ... 389 - And Anbasah. 390 - And Muhammad. ... 391 - And Yahya, the sons of Sa'id ibn Aban ibn Sa'id ibn al-As al-Umawi.
foot_note:
1. = wa Al-Ta'dil 5/224.
383 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/44 and he said: The brother of Yazid ibn Ruman, from the people of Medina.
384 - Al-Madani, Abu Ruh, Mawla of the family of Al-Zubayr. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the fifth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and thirty. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/331, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/260, Al-Thiqat 7/615, Al-Tahdhib 11/350.
385 - The brother of Ubayd Allah. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the eleventh [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and thirty-eight. / Kh; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/64, Al-Tahdhib 5/234.
386 - Abu al-Fadl, Al-Baghdadi, the Judge of Isfahan. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the eleventh [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and sixty, at the age of seventy-five. / Kh D T S; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil (5/317), Al-Tahdhib 7/15.
387 - Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the ninth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred. / M S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/450, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/407, Al-Thiqat 8/430, Al-Tahdhib 7/66. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Yahya ibn Sa'id. Al-Hafiz said in Al-Tahdhib: Al-Daraqutni said: They are four brothers: Yahya, Muhammad, Abd Allah, and Ubayd Allah, and they are Thiqah (trustworthy).
388 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/104, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/72, and they said: The brother of Anbasah and Yahya.
389 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 7/36, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 6/400, and they said: The brother of Ubayd, Yahya, and Muhammad.
390 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 1/92 and he said: The brother of Ubayd, Anbasah, Yahya, and Abd Allah. And Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 7/264, Abu Hatim said: The brother of Yahya.
391 - Abu Ayyub, Al-Kufi, resident of Baghdad, nicknamed Al-Jamal (The Camel). Saduq (Truthful) but narrates strange reports [Yughrib]. From the elders of the ninth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and ninety-four, and he was eighty years old. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/277, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/151, Al-Tahdhib 11/213. Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Abd Allah, Anbasah, and Ubayd, and Ibn Abi Hatim added: and Muhammad.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 392 - Abd Allah ibn Salman al-A'azz. ... 393 - And Ubayd Allah ibn Salman. 394 - Abd Allah ibn Shamit ibn Ajlan. ... 395 - And Ubayd Allah ibn Shamit. 396 - Abd Allah ibn Abbad ibn Ja'far. ... 397 - And Muhammad ibn Abbad. 398 - Abd Allah ibn Abd Allah ibn Khabib. ... 399 - And Muslim ibn Abd Allah. 400 - And Mu'adh ibn Abd Allah. 401 - Abd Allah ibn Abd Allah ibn Awf. ... 402 - And Abd al-Rahman.
foot_note:
1. 392 - Al-Madani, Mawla of Juhaynah. Saduq (Truthful), from the sixth [generation]. / M; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/109, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/69, Al-Thiqat 7/5, Al-Tahdhib 5/241. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Ubayd Allah.
293 - Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the sixth [generation]. / Kh T Kn Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/384, Al-Jarh 5/316, Al-Tahdhib 7/18.
294 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/118, and he said: Abd Allah ibn Shamit or Ubayd Allah. And Ibn Hibban mentioned him in Al-Thiqat 7/39 and said: Abd Allah is the brother of Ubayd Allah.
295 - Al-Shaybani, Al-Basri. Thiqah (Trustworthy), from the eighth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and eighty-one. / T; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/384, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/319, Al-Tahdhib 7/18.
396 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/143, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/106, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/32, and they said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Abbad.
397 - Al-Makhzumi, Al-Makki. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the third [generation]. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/175, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/13, Al-Tahdhib 9/243.
398 - Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Mu'adh. Ibn Hibban added: and Muslim; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/126, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/90, Al-Thiqat 5/30, Ta'jil al-Manfa'ah 152.
399 - Majhul (Unknown) from the third [generation]. / D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/265, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/188, Al-Tahdhib 10/133.
400 - Al-Madani. Saduq (Truthful), perhaps he commits an error (Wahm). From the fourth [generation]. / Bukh 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/362, Al-Jarh 8/246, Al-Tahdhib 10/191.
401 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother Ubayd Allah in Al-Thiqat 8/403. Ibn Hibban said: They are three brothers: Ubayd Allah, Abd Allah, and Abd al-Rahman.
402 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother Ubayd Allah as previously cited.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 403 - And Ubayd Allah ibn Abd Allah. ... 404 - Abd Allah ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Azhar. 405 - And Abd al-Hamid ibn Abd al-Rahman. ... 406 - And Mawhab ibn Abd al-Rahman. 407 - Abd Allah ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Hatib. ... 408 - And Yahya ibn Abd al-Rahman. 409 - Abd Allah ibn Awn. ... 410 - And Muhriz ibn Awn. ... 411 - And Mukhtar ibn Awn. 412 - Abd Allah ibn Lahi'ah. ... 413 - And Isa ibn Lahi'ah.
foot_note:
1. 403 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/388, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/322, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 8/403.
404 - Al-Zuhri, Al-Madani. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the third [generation]. / D; Al-Thiqat 5/17, Al-Tahdhib 5/290.
405 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 6/44, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/127.
406 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/415, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/455. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abd al-Hamid and Abd Allah. It has been said: Mawhub ibn Abd al-Rahman.
407 - Mentioned by Ibn Sa'd in Al-Tabaqat 6/251 and he said: He was killed on the Day of al-Harra.
408 - Ibn Abi Balta'ah, Abu Muhammad, and [also called] Abu Bakr al-Madani. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the third [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and four. / M 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/289, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/165, Al-Thiqat 5/523, Al-Tahdhib 11/249. Ibn Hibban said: His brother Abd Allah was killed on the Day of al-Harra.
409 - Abu Muhammad, Al-Baghdadi. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Abid (Worshipper). From the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and thirty-two according to the correct view. / M S; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/131, Al-Kashif 2/103, Al-Tahdhib 5/149. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Muhriz ibn Awn.
410 - Abu al-Fadl, Al-Baghdadi. Saduq (Truthful). From the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and thirty-one, and he was eighty-seven. / M; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 10/346, Al-Thiqat 9/191, Al-Kashif 3/109, Al-Tahdhib 10/57. Al-Dhahabi said: The brother of the ascetic Abd Allah. Al-Hafiz said: He narrated from his brother Mukhtar ibn Awn.
411 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/194, and he said: His brother Muhriz ibn Awn narrated from him; Tarikh Baghdad 13/264.
412 - Abd Allah ibn Lahi'ah (with Fatha on the Lam and Kasra on the Ha) ibn Uqbah al-Hadrami, Abu Abd al-Rahman, Al-Misri, the Judge. Saduq (Truthful) from the seventh [generation]. He became confused after his books were burned. He died in the year one hundred and seventy-four, having exceeded eighty [years of age]. / M D T Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/182, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/145, Al-Tahdhib 5/373.
413 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/234, and he said: The brother of Abd Allah ibn Lahi'ah. And mentioned by Al-Uqayli =

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 414 - Abd Allah ibn Wadi'ah. ... 415 - And Yazid ibn Wadi'ah. 416 - Abd Allah ibn Wahb ibn Munabbih. ... 417 - And Abd al-Rahman ibn Wahb. 418 - Abd Allah ibn Yahya ibn Zayd al-Yamami. ... 419 - And Musa ibn Yahya. 420 - Abd al-A'la ibn al-Hajjaj. ... 421 - And Qays ibn al-Hajjaj. 422 - Abd al-Jabbar ibn Abi Hazim. ... 423 - And Abd al-Khaliq ibn Abi Hazim. 424 - And Abd al-Aziz ibn Abi Hazim.
foot_note:
1. = in Al-Du'afa 3/397, Al-Mizan 3/322, Al-Lisan 4/403.
414 - Abd Allah ibn Wadi'ah ibn Khidham, with Kasra on the pointed letter [Kh]. Al-Ansari, Al-Madani. His companionship is disputed. Ibn Hibban declared him Thiqah. He was killed on the Day of al-Harra. / Kh Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/220, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/192, Al-Thiqat 5/54, Al-Isabah 4/260, Al-Tahdhib 6/68. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Yazid.
415 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/293.
416 - Al-Yamani. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the sixth [generation]. / 'A S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/218, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/189, Al-Tahdhib 6/74.
417 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/360, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/296, and they said: The brother of Abd Allah, and Abd Allah is older than him.
418 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/231, and he said: The brother of Musa al-Yamami.
419 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother in Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir as previously cited.
420 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 6/73, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/28, and they said: The brother of Qays.
421 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 7/155, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 7/95, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/329.
422 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 6/109, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 6/32, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/135, and he said: The brother of Abd al-Aziz.
423 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/139 and he said: The brother of Abd al-Aziz.
424 - The name of Abu Hazim is Salamah ibn Dinar al-Madani. Saduq (Truthful), Faqih (Jurist). From the eighth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and eighty-four, or it is said before that. / 'A; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/382, Al-Tahdhib 6/333.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 425 - Abd al-Jabbar ibn Muslim. ... 426 - And Al-Walid ibn Muslim. 427 - Abd al-Hamid ibn Jubayr ibn Shaybah. ... 428 - And Yazid ibn Jubayr. 431 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Ishaq ibn Abd Allah. ... 432 - And Hisham ibn Ishaq. 435 - Abd al-Rahman ibn al-Zubayr. ... 436 - And Al-Nu'man ibn al-Zubayr. 437 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Sabit. ... 438 - And Muhammad ibn Sabit.
foot_note:
1. 425 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/136 and he said: The brother of Al-Walid ibn Muslim. Al-Dhahabi mentioned him in Al-Mizan 2/534 and said: I do not know him. Al-Daraqutni said: Da'if (Weak), Al-Lisan 3/389.
426 - Al-Walid ibn Muslim, Al-Qurashi, their Mawla, Abu al-Abbas, Al-Dimashqi. Thiqah (Trustworthy) but practiced Tadlis and Taswiyah (a severe form of Tadlis) frequently. From the eighth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and ninety-four or the beginning of ninety-five. / 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/152, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/16, Al-Tahdhib 11/151.
427 - Ibn Uthman ibn Abi Talhah al-Abdari al-Hajabi, Al-Makki. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the fifth [generation]. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/46, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/9, Al-Tahdhib 6/111.
428 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 8/324, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/617, and they said: The brother of Abd al-Hamid; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/255.
431 - Al-Madani, resident of Basra. He is also called Abbad. Saduq (Truthful), accused of Qadariyyah. From the sixth [generation]. / Bukh M 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/258, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/212, Al-Tahdhib 6/137.
432 - Abu Abd al-Rahman, Al-Madani, Al-Qurashi. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the seventh [generation]; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/196, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/52, Al-Thiqat 7/568, Al-Tahdhib 11/31. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abd al-Rahman ibn Ishaq.
435 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/286, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/236, and they said: The brother of Al-Nu'man.
436 - Ibn Ma'in said he is Thiqah (Trustworthy); Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/79, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/448.
437 - Also called Abd al-Rahman ibn Abd Allah ibn Sabit, which is the correct view. And called Abd al-Rahman al-Jumahi al-Makki. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Kathir al-Irsal (Frequently narrates with broken chains). From the third [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and eighteen. / M 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/294, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/240, Al-Tahdhib 6/180.
438 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 1/104, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 7/283, and they said: The brother of Abd al-Rahman ibn Sabit. Ibn Abi Hatim added: I heard my father say: I do not know him.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 439 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Sa'id ibn Abi Burdah. ... 440 - And Musa ibn Sa'id. 441 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Abd Allah ibn Abi Atiq. ... 442 - And Uthman ibn Abd Allah. 443 - And Muhammad ibn Abd Allah. 444 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Abd Allah ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Abi Sa'sa'ah. 445 - And Muhammad ibn Abd Allah. 446 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Umayr ibn Suwayd. ... 447 - And Abd al-Malik ibn Umayr. 448 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn al-Ash'ath. ... 449 - And Qays ibn Muhammad.
foot_note:
1. 439 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/84 and he said: The brother of Musa ibn Sa'id from whom Ibn Abi Idris narrated.
440 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother in Al-Thiqat 7/84 as previously cited.
441 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/302, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/255.
442 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 6/232, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 6/156. Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Abd al-Rahman and Muhammad from the family of Abu Bakr.
443 - The name of Abu Atiq is Muhammad ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Abi Bakr al-Taymi al-Madani. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the seventh [generation]. / Kh D T S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/128, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/302, Al-Tahdhib 9/277.
444 - Al-Ansari, Al-Mazini. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the sixth [generation]. He died during the Caliphate of Al-Mansur. / Kh D S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/303, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/250, Al-Tahdhib 6/209. Al-Bukhari said: Malik narrated from Muhammad and Abd al-Rahman, the sons of Abd Allah.
445 - Abu Abd al-Rahman, Al-Madani. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the sixth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and thirty-nine. / Kh S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/140, Al-Tahdhib 9/262.
446 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/328, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/66, and they said: The brother of Abd al-Malik ibn Umayr.
447 - Al-Lakhmi, Al-Kufi. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Fasih (Eloquent), Alim (Scholar). His memory changed and he perhaps practiced Tadlis. From the fourth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and thirty-six, and he was one hundred and three years old. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/426, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/360, Al-Tahdhib 6/411.
448 - Majhul al-Hal (Condition unknown) from the sixth [generation]. He was killed after the [year] ninety. / D; Al-Tahdhib 6/256.
449 - Al-Kufi. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the sixth [generation]. / D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/152, Al-Thiqat 5/315. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad al-Ash'ath, Al-Tahdhib 8/402.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 450 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Mushir. ... 451 - And Ali ibn Mushir. 452 - Abd al-Rahman ibn Yahya al-Sadafi. ... 453 - And Mu'awiyah ibn Yahya. 454 - Abd al-Rahim ibn Sa'id al-Abras. ... 455 - And Muhammad ibn Sa'id al-Maslub. 456 - Abd al-Razzaq ibn Hammam ibn Nafi'. ... 457 - And Abd al-Wahhab ibn Hammam.
foot_note:
1. 450 - Yahya ibn Ma'in said: He is nothing. Al-Bukhari said: There is some question about him; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/351, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/291, Al-Lisan 3/437. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Ali ibn Mushir.
451 - Ali ibn Mushir (with Damma on the Mim, Sukun on the unpointed letter, and Kasra on the Ha), Al-Qurashi, Al-Kufi, the Judge of Mosul. Thiqah (Trustworthy), has strange reports after he went blind. From the eighth [generation]. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/297, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/204, Al-Tahdhib 7/383. Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Abd al-Rahman ibn Mushir.
452 - Al-Dhahabi said in Al-Mizan 2/598: The brother of Mu'awiyah ibn Yahya. Ahmad ibn Hanbal softened him [indicated weakness]; Al-Lisan 3/444.
453 - Abu Ruh, Al-Dimashqi, lived in Rayy. Da'if (Weak). What he narrated in the Levant is better than what he narrated in Rayy. From the seventh [generation]. / T Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/336, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/383, Al-Tahdhib 10/219.
454 - Al-Dhahabi said: It is not known who this is. Ibn Hibban mentioned him in Al-Thiqat 7/134; Al-Mizan 2/605, Al-Lisan 4/6. Ibn Hibban, Al-Dhahabi, and Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Sa'id al-Maslub.
455 - They called him a liar. Ahmad ibn Salih said: He fabricated four thousand hadiths. Ahmad said: Al-Mansur killed him for Zandaqa (heresy) and crucified him. From the sixth [generation]. / T Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/94, Al-Jarh 7/262, Al-Mizan 3/561, Al-Tahdhib 9/184.
456 - Al-Himyari, their Mawla, Abu Bakr al-San'ani. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Hafiz (Preserver), famous author. He went blind at the end of his life and changed. He used to lean towards Shi'ism. From the ninth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and eleven, and he was eighty-five. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/130, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/38, Al-Tahdhib 6/310.
457 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 6/97, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/70, and they said: The brother of Abd al-Razzaq.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 458 - Abd al-Aziz ibn Sulayman ibn Abi al-Sa'ib. ... 459 - And Al-Walid ibn Sulayman. 460 - Abd al-Muttalib ibn Rabi'ah ibn al-Harith. ... 461 - And Muhammad ibn Rabi'ah. 462 - Abd al-Malik ibn Hakim. ... 463 - And Nu'aym ibn Hakim. 464 - Abd al-Malik ibn Abd Allah ibn Fayruz. ... 465 - And Umar ibn Abd Allah. 466 - Abd al-Malik ibn Ma'n ibn Abd al-Rahman. ... 467 - And Al-Qasim ibn Ma'n. 468 - Ubayd Allah ibn Abi Bakr ibn Anas ibn Malik. ... 469 - And Al-Nu'man ibn Abi Bakr.
foot_note:
1. 458 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/113 and he said: The brother of Al-Walid ibn Sulayman.
459 - Al-Qurashi. Thiqah (Trustworthy), from the sixth [generation]. / Sd S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/145, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/6, Al-Tahdhib 11/134. Al-Hafiz said: He narrated from his brother Abd al-Aziz.
460 - Al-Hashimi. A Companion who lived in the Levant. He died in the year sixty-two. It is said his name is Al-Muttalib. / M D S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/131, Usd al-Ghabah 3/508, Al-Isabah 4/380, Al-Tahdhib 6/383.
461 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh and he said: I see him as the brother of Abd al-Muttalib. Ibn Hibban mentioned him in Al-Thiqat 5/357 and said: The brother of Abd al-Muttalib; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/252.
462 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/411, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/346, and they said: The brother of Nu'aym.
463 - Al-Mada'ini. Saduq (Truthful), has delusions (Awham). From the sixth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and forty-eight. / Y D S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/99, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/462, Al-Tahdhib 10/457. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Abd al-Malik.
464 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/420, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/354, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/102. Ibn Abi Hatim and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Umar ibn Abd Allah.
465 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil and Al-Thiqat as previously cited.
466 - Ibn Abd Allah ibn Mas'ud al-Hudhali, Abu Ubaydah al-Mas'udi. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the seventh [generation]. / M D S Q; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/368, Al-Tahdhib 6/425.
467 - Preceded in the book of Ali ibn al-Madini under biography number 160.
468 - Abu Mu'adh. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the fourth [generation]. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/375, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/309, Al-Tahdhib 7/5.
469 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/473, and he said: The brother of Ubayd Allah ibn Abi Bakr; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/446.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 470 - Ubayd Allah ibn al-Qibtiyyah. ... 471 - And Muhajir ibn al-Qibtiyyah. 472 - Ubayd Allah ibn al-Mundhir ibn al-Zubayr. ... 473 - And Muhammad ibn al-Mundhir ibn al-Zubayr. 474 - Ubayd ibn Humran. ... 475 - And Ma'bad ibn Humran. 476 - Utbah ibn Abd Allah ibn Amr ibn al-As. ... 477 - And Al-Qasim ibn Abd Allah. 478 - And Muhammad ibn Abd Allah. 479 - Uthman ibn Dinar. ... 480 - And Malik ibn Dinar.
foot_note:
1. 470 - Al-Kufi. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the fourth [generation]. / Y M D S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/396, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/331, Al-Tahdhib 7/44.
471 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/428, and he said: I reckon him to be the brother of Ubayd Allah ibn al-Qibtiyyah; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/260.
472 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/152 and he said: The brother of Muhammad ibn al-Zubayr.
473 - Ibn Hibban said in Al-Thiqat 7/405, and he said: He narrates Mursal and Maqati' reports, and he is the brother of Abd Allah ibn al-Mundhir; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/153, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/97.
474 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 5/447, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 5/405, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/156. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Ma'bad. Ibn Abi Hatim and Al-Hafiz in Al-Lisan 4/119 said: Abu Ma'bad.
475 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 7/399, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 8/279. Ibn Abi Hatim said: Ma'bad ibn Hibran.
476 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 2/372, and he said: Majhul (Unknown); Al-Lisan 4/128.
477 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 7/111, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/303.
478 - Al-Ta'ifi. Maqbul (Acceptable), from the third [generation]. / D T S; Al-Thiqat 5/353, Al-Tahdhib 9/266.
479 - Al-Dhahabi mentioned him in Al-Mizan 3/33 and said: The father of Hukamah is nothing (worthless), and the report is a clear lie. Ibn Hibban mentioned him in Al-Thiqat 7/194, Al-Lisan 4/140. Ibn Hibban, Al-Dhahabi, and Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Malik ibn Dinar.
480 - Al-Basri, the Ascetic (Al-Zahid), Abu Yahya. Saduq (Truthful), Abid (Worshipper). From the fifth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and thirty, or thereabouts. / Bukh 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/309, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/208, Al-Tahdhib 10/14.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 481 - Uthman ibn Zafar ibn Muzahim. ... 482 - And Muzahim ibn Zafar. 483 - Uthman ibn Affan. ... 484 - The brother of Al-Walid ibn Uqbah ibn Abi Mu'ayt through his mother. 485 - Uthman ibn Umar ibn Musa ibn Ubayd Allah ibn Ma'mar. ... 486 - And Isa ibn Umar. 487 - Uthman ibn Amr ibn Sah. ... 488 - And Al-Walid ibn Amr. 489 - Uthman ibn Mudarris. ... 490 - And Umar ibn Mudarris.
foot_note:
1. 481 - Al-Taymi, Abu Zafar and Abu Umar, Al-Kufi. Saduq (Truthful), from the elders of the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and eighteen. / T S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/222, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/150, Al-Tahdhib 7/116. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Muzahim.
482 - Maqbul (Acceptable) from the ninth [generation]. / Tamyiz; Al-Tahdhib 10/100. Al-Hafiz said: His brother Uthman narrated from him.
483 - Commander of the Faithful, Dhu al-Nurayn (Possessor of Two Lights), one of the foremost early believers, one of the four Caliphs, and one of the ten promised Paradise. / 'A; Al-Isabah 8/456, Al-Tahdhib 7/139.
484 - Ibn Amr ibn Umayyah al-Qurashi al-Umawi. The brother of Uthman through his mother. He has companionship (Suhba), and lived until the Caliphate of Mu'awiyah. / D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/140, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/8, Al-Thiqat 3/429, Al-Tahdhib 11/142.
485 - Al-Taymi, Al-Madani, its Judge. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the sixth [generation]. He died in the Caliphate of Al-Mansur. / Bukh D Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/239, Al-Thiqat 7/200, Al-Tahdhib 7/143.
486 - Hijazi, perhaps attributed to his grandfather. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the seventh [generation]. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/397, Al-Thiqat 8/489, Al-Tahdhib 8/222. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Uthman ibn Amr.
487 - Al-Jazari, Mawla of Banu Umayyah, and he may be attributed to his grandfather. There is weakness in him. From the ninth [generation]. / S; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/162, Al-Thiqat 8/449, Al-Tahdhib 7/144. Abu Hatim said: Uthman and Al-Walid, the sons of Amr ibn Sah, their hadith is written but not used as proof. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Al-Walid ibn Amr.
488 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Majruhin 3/79 and he said: His hadith is very Munkar (rejected/singular); Al-Mizan 4/342, Al-Lisan 6/224.
489 - Ibn Ma'in said: Uthman and Umar, the sons of Mudarris, I do not know them; Tarikh Ibn Ma'in narration of Al-Darimi 96, Al-Thiqat 7/204, Al-Mizan 3/52, Al-Lisan 4/153. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Umar.
490 - Ibn Ma'in said: Uthman and Umar, the sons of Mudarris, I do not know them; Tarikh Ibn Ma'in narration of Sa'id =

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 491 - Ikrimah ibn Khalid ibn al-As. ... 492 - And Mughirah ibn Khalid. 493 - Ali ibn al-Aqmar ibn Amr al-Hamdani. ... 494 - And Kulthum ibn al-Aqmar. 495 - Ali ibn Fudayl ibn Iyad. ... 496 - And Muhammad ibn Fudayl. ... 497 - And Abu Ubaydah ibn Fudayl. 498 - Ali ibn Mas'adah al-Bahili. ... 499 - And Hudhayl ibn Mas'adah. 500 - Ali ibn Muslim ibn Khabbab. ... 501 - And Muhammad ibn Muslim.
foot_note:
1. = Al-Darimi 96, Al-Thiqat 7/182.
491 - Al-Makhzumi. Thiqah (Trustworthy), from the third [generation]. / Kh M D T S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/49, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/9, Al-Thiqat 5/231, Al-Tahdhib 7/258.
492 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/406 and he said: The brother of Ikrimah ibn Khalid from the people of Mecca.
493 - Al-Wadi'i, Abu al-Wazi', Kufi. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the fourth [generation]. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/261, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/174, Al-Thiqat 5/162, Al-Tahdhib 7/283. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Kulthum. Al-Hafiz said: It was said: The brother of Kulthum.
494 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/336 and he said: The brother of Ali ibn al-Aqmar; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/227, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/163.
495 - Al-Taymi. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Abid (Worshipper). From the ninth [generation]. His death preceded his father's. / S; Al-Tahdhib 7/373.
496 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/58.
497 - Al-Dhahabi said in Al-Mizan 4/455: He has leniency (Lin). Ibn al-Jawzi said: Da'if (Weak). Al-Daraqutni declared him Thiqah, so no attention is paid to the statement of Ibn al-Jawzi. Al-Iraqi mentioned him in Dhayl al-Kashif 334 and said: Al-Daraqutni said: He and his brothers Muhammad and Ali all narrated, and they are Thiqah (trustworthy), reliable, ascetics.
498 - Abu Habib, Al-Basri. Saduq (Truthful), has delusions (Awham). From the seventh [generation]. / Bukh T Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/294, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/204, Al-Tahdhib 7/381.
499 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 9/114, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat, and they said: The brother of Ali ibn Mas'adah.
500 - Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Muhammad. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Muslim; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/296, Al-Jarh 6/203, Al-Thiqat 7/206.
501 - I did not find his biography, and I fear it might be Muhammad ibn Muslim ibn al-Sa'ib ibn Khabbab. If it is him, then he is in the narrators of Al-Taqrib.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 502 - Umar ibn Bayan al-Taghlibi. ... 503 - And Muhammad ibn Bayan. 504 - Umar ibn Jabir al-Yamami. ... 505 - And Muhammad ibn Jabir ibn Sayyar. 506 - Umar ibn Abd Allah ibn Urwah ibn al-Zubayr. ... 507 - And Maslamah ibn Abd Allah. 508 - Umar ibn Abd al-Malik ibn al-Mughirah. ... 509 - And Nawfal ibn Abd al-Malik. 510 - And Yazid ibn Abd al-Malik. 511 - Umar ibn Kathir ibn al-Muttalib. ... 512 - And Kathir ibn Kathir.
foot_note:
1. 502 - Al-Kufi. Maqbul (Acceptable), from the sixth [generation]. / D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/143, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/99, Al-Tahdhib 7/430.
503 - Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Umar ibn Bayan; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/45, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 3/213, Al-Thiqat 5/361.
504 - Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Jabir; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/145, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/101, Al-Thiqat 8/438.
505 - Al-Hanafi, Abu Abd Allah, originally from Kufa. Saduq (Truthful). His books were lost so his memory worsened, and he mixed up things greatly, and aged so he began to be prompted. From the seventh [generation]. He died after the year one hundred and seventy. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/53, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/219, Al-Tahdhib 9/88.
506 - Preceded in the book of Ali ibn al-Madini biography number 108.
507 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/489 and he said: The brother of Umar ibn Abd Allah; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/270.
508 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/171 and he said: They are three brothers: Yazid, Amr, and Nawfal.
509 - Al-Hashimi. Mastur (Hidden/Status unknown) from the sixth [generation], and he has Mursal narration. / Q; Al-Tahdhib 10/491. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Yazid.
510 - Da'if (Weak) from the sixth [generation]. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/348, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/287, Al-Tahdhib 11/347.
511 - Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Kathir ibn Kathir. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Kathir ibn Kathir; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/188, Al-Jarh 6/130, Al-Thiqat 7/180.
512 - Al-Sahmi, Al-Makki. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the sixth [generation]. / Kh D S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/211, Al-Jarh 7/156, Al-Tahdhib 8/426.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 513 - Amr ibn Khalifah. ... 514 - And Hawdhah. 515 - Amr Uthman ibn Sa'id. ... 516 - And Yahya ibn Uthman. 517 - Amr ibn Uthman ibn Abd al-Rahman. ... 518 - And Muhammad ibn Uthman. 519 - Imran ibn Aban ibn Imran. ... 520 - And Muhammad ibn Aban. 521 - Imran ibn Umayr. ... 522 - And Al-Qasim ibn Abd al-Rahman, his brother through his mother.
foot_note:
1. 513 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/229 and he said: The brother of Hawdhah ibn Khalifah, and he was older than Hawdhah; Al-Lisan 4/363.
514 - Hawdhah ibn Khalifah ibn Abd Allah ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Abi Bakrah al-Thaqafi. Saduq (Truthful) from the ninth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and sixteen. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/246, Al-Jarh 9/118, Al-Thiqat 7/590, Al-Tahdhib 11/74.
515 - Ibn Kathir ibn Dinar al-Qurashi, their Mawla, Abu Hafs, Al-Himsi. Saduq (Truthful) from the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and fifty. / D S Q; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/249, Al-Tahdhib 8/76. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Yahya.
516 - Al-Himsi. Saduq (Truthful), Abid (Worshipper). From the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and fifty-five. / D S Q; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/174, Al-Thiqat 9/265, Al-Tahdhib 11/255.
517 - Al-Makhzumi, and it is said his name is: Umar. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the seventh [generation]. / Bukh D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/178, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/124, and Al-Thiqat 7/179 and he mentioned him under 'Amr'; Al-Tahdhib 8/78. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Muhammad.
518 - Al-Madani. Saduq (Truthful), from the sixth [generation]. / D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/179, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/23, Al-Thiqat 7/437, Al-Tahdhib 9/338. Al-Bukhari said: The brother of Umar.
519 - Al-Sulami or Al-Qurashi, Abu Musa al-Tahhan al-Wasiti. Da'if (Weak) from the ninth [generation]. / S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/409, Al-Jarh 6/293, Al-Thiqat 8/497, Al-Tahdhib 8/121. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Hibban, and Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Yahya.
520 - Saduq (Truthful), he was spoken about. Al-Azdi from the tenth [generation]. He lived ninety years. / Kh; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/32, Al-Jarh 7/199, Al-Tahdhib 9/2. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Imran.
521 - Mawla of Abd Allah ibn Mas'ud. Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 6/420, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/301, and they said: The brother of Al-Qasim ibn Abd al-Rahman through his mother.
522 - Preceded in the book of Ali ibn al-Madini under biography number 158.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
523 - Imran ibn Musa. ... 524 - And Quraysh ibn Musa. 525 - Ammar ibn Sa'd al-Quraz. ... 526 - And Umar ibn Sa'd al-Quraz. 527 - Al-Awwam ibn Hawshab ibn Yazid. ... 528 - And Marthad ibn Hawshab. 529 - Awf ibn al-Harith ibn al-Tufayl ibn Sakhbarah. ... 530 - And Rumaythah bint al-Harith. 531 - Isa ibn Abd Allah ibn Malik al-Dar. ... 532 - And Muhammad ibn Abd Allah.
The Letter Fa'
533 - Al-Fadl ibn Bukayr. ... 534 - And Yunus ibn Bukayr.
foot_note:
1. 523 - Al-Laythi, Abu Amr, Al-Basri. Saduq (Truthful) from the tenth [generation]. He died after the [year two] hundred and forty. / T S Q; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/305, Al-Thiqat 8/499, Al-Tahdhib 8/141. Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Quraysh ibn Musa.
524 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil as previously cited.
525 - The Mu'adhin (Caller to prayer). Maqbul (Acceptable), from the third [generation]. Whoever claimed he had companionship (Suhba) was mistaken. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/26, Al-Jarh 6/389, Al-Thiqat 5/267, Al-Tahdhib 7/401.
526 - Maqbul (Acceptable) from the third [generation]. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/158, Al-Thiqat 5/148, Al-Tahdhib 7/450. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Ammar.
527 - Al-Shaybani, Abu Isa, Al-Wasiti. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Thabt (Firm), Fadil (Virtuous). From the sixth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and forty-eight. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/67, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/22, Al-Tahdhib 8/163.
528 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/522 and he said: The brother of Al-Awwam ibn Hawshab.
529 - Al-Azdi. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the third [generation]. / Kh D S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/57, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/14, Al-Tahdhib 8/168.
530 - Maqbula (Acceptable) from the fourth [generation]. / S; Al-Thiqat 4/244, Al-Tahdhib 12/419. Ibn Hibban and Al-Hafiz said: The sister of Awf ibn al-Harith.
531 - Al-Umari, their Mawla. Also called Abd Allah ibn Isa. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the sixth [generation]. / D S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 6/389, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 6/280, Al-Tahdhib 8/217. Al-Bukhari said: I reckon him to be the brother of Muhammad al-Dar. Al-Hafiz said: His brother Muhammad narrated from him.
532 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 1/127, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 7/304. Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Isa.
533 - Mentioned in the biography of his brother Yunus in Al-Thiqat as will follow.
534 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/289 and he said: The brother of Al-Fadl ibn Bukayr.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
535 - Al-Fadl ibn Abi Talib. ... 536 - And Yahya ibn Abi Talib. 537 - Al-Fadl ibn Muhalhil. ... 538 - And Al-Mufaddal ibn Muhalhil. 539 - Fudayl ibn Abd al-Wahhab al-Qannad. ... 540 - And Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab.
The Letter Kaf
541 - Kathir ibn Abi al-Mukhtar. ... 542 - And Yusuf ibn Abi al-Mukhtar. 543 - Kulthum ibn Shumayl. ... 544 - And Al-Nadr ibn Shumayl.
foot_note:
1. 535 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/7 and he said: The brother of Yahya ibn Abi Talib; Tarikh Baghdad 12/364.
536 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/270 and he said: The name of Abu Talib is Ja'far; Tarikh Baghdad 14/220.
537 - Ibn Hibban said in Al-Thiqat 9/5: Abu al-Mufaddal al-Makki, one of the worshippers, the brother of Al-Mufaddal ibn Muhalhil. Ibn Abi Hatim said in Al-Jarh 7/67: The brother of Al-Mufaddal.
538 - Al-Sa'di, Abu Abd al-Rahman, Al-Kufi. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Thabt (Firm), Nabil (Noble), Abid (Worshipper). From the seventh [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and sixty-seven. / M S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/406, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/316, Al-Tahdhib 10/275. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Al-Fadl.
539 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/9 and he said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/74, Tarikh Baghdad 12/392.
540 - Abu Yahya, also called Al-Sukkari. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Abid (Worshipper). From the ninth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and twelve, or it is said before that. / T S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/68, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/12, Al-Thiqat 7/443, Al-Tahdhib 8/292. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Al-Fudayl.
541 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 7/226, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/157, and they said: The brother of Yusuf.
542 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 8/387, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/232.
543 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/165 and he said: The brother of Al-Nadr ibn Shumayl.
544 - Al-Mazini, Abu al-Hasan, the Grammarian, Al-Basri, resident of Marw. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Thabt (Firm), from the elders of the ninth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and four, and he was eighty-two years old. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/90, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/477, Al-Tahdhib 10/437.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
The Letter Mim
545 - Mujahid ibn Rashid. ... 546 - And Makhul ibn Rashid. 547 - Muhammad ibn Sa'id al-Ta'ifi. ... 548 - And Mughirah ibn Sa'id. 549 - Muhammad ibn Talhah ibn Yazid ibn Rukanah. ... 550 - And Yazid ibn Talhah. 551 - Muhammad ibn Abd Allah ibn Qarib. ... 552 - And Wahb ibn Abd Allah. 553 - Muhammad ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Talhah. ... 554 - And Mansur ibn Abd al-Rahman.
foot_note:
1. 545 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 7/412, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/320, and they said: The brother of Makhul.
546 - Makhul, on the pattern of Muhammad, ibn Rashid. Abu Rashid, Ibn Abi Majalid al-Nahdi, their Mawla, Al-Kufi. Attributed to Shi'ism. From the sixth [generation]. He died after the year one hundred and forty. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/29, Al-Jarh 8/398, Al-Tahdhib 10/79.
547 - Abu Sa'id, the Mu'adhin. Saduq (Truthful) from the sixth [generation]. / D S; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/265, Al-Tahdhib 9/191.
548 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/463 and he said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Sa'id.
549 - Al-Makki. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the sixth [generation]. / D Sd Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/120, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/291, Al-Tahdhib 9/239.
550 - Ibn Hibban said in Al-Thiqat 5/541: The brother of Muhammad ibn Talhah; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/343, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/273.
551 - Al-Bukhari said in his Tarikh 1/146, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 7/319: Muhammad ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Qarib, and it is said: Muhammad ibn Abd Allah ibn Qarib.
552 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 8/165, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 9/22, and they said: I see him as the brother of Muhammad ibn Abd Allah ibn Qarib. Ibn Hibban mentioned him in Al-Thiqat 7/556 and said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Abd Allah ibn Qarib.
553 - Al-Abdari, the brother of Mansur. Da'if (Weak) from the seventh [generation]. / D; Al-Tahdhib 9/298. Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Mansur.
554 - Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the fifth [generation]. Ibn Hazm erred in weakening him. He died in the year one hundred and thirty-seven or thirty-eight. / Kh M D S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/343, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/174, Al-Tahdhib 10/310.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 555 - Muhammad ibn Uqbah al-Shaybani. ... 556 - And Al-Walid ibn Uqbah. 557 - Muhammad ibn Amr al-Minqari. ... 558 - And Abu Ma'mar al-Minqari. 559 - Muhammad ibn Umayr ibn Abi al-Gharif. ... 560 - And Hudhayl ibn Umayr. 561 - Muhammad ibn Ya'qub ibn Abd Allah. ... 562 - And Musa ibn Ya'qub. 563 - Mubarak ibn Fudalah ibn Abi Umayyah. ... 564 - Mufaddal ibn Fudalah.
foot_note:
1. 555 - Al-Tahhan, Al-Kufi. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and twenty according to the correct view. / Kh; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 1/200, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/36, Al-Tahdhib 9/346. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Al-Walid ibn Uqbah.
556 - Saduq (Truthful) from the ninth [generation]. / D; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/150, Al-Jarh 9/12, Al-Thiqat 9/50, Al-Tahdhib 11/144. Al-Bukhari, Ibn Abi Hatim, and Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Uqbah.
557 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/43 and he said: The brother of Abu Ma'mar.
558 - He is Abd Allah ibn Amr ibn Abi al-Hajjaj al-Tamimi, Abu Ma'mar. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Thabt (Firm). Accused of Qadariyyah. From the tenth [generation]. He died in the year two hundred and twenty-four. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 5/155, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 5/119, Al-Tahdhib 5/335.
559 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 1/194, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/40.
560 - Abu Zur'ah said: Kufi, there is no harm in him; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/113. Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/244 and he said: The brother of Muhammad ibn Umayr.
561 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 1/267, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 7/429, and they said: The brother of Musa ibn Ya'qub.
562 - Al-Muttalibi, Al-Zama'i, Abu Muhammad, Al-Madani. Saduq (Truthful), bad memory. From the seventh [generation]. He died after the [year one] hundred and forty. / Bukh 4, Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/298, Al-Tahdhib 10/378.
563 - Abu Fudalah, Al-Basri. Saduq (Truthful), practices Tadlis and Taswiyah. From the sixth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and sixty-six according to the correct view. / Bukh D T Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/426, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/338, Al-Tahdhib 10/28.
564 - Abu Malik, Al-Basri, the brother of Mubarak. Da'if (Weak) from the seventh [generation]. / D T Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/405, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/317, Al-Thiqat 7/496, Al-Kashif 3/150, Al-Tahdhib 10/273. Al-Dhahabi and Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Mubarak. Al-Hafiz said: And some claimed he is the brother of Al-Faraj ibn Fudalah, but that is nothing [incorrect].

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text: 565 - Muharrar ibn Harun ibn Abd Allah. ... 566 - And Harun ibn Harun. 567 - Marwan ibn Abi Dawud. ... 568 - And Harun ibn Abi Dawud. ... 569 - And Hilal ibn Abi Dawud. 570 - Al-Mughirah ibn Sa'd ibn al-Ahzam. ... 571 - And Al-Walid ibn Sa'd. 572 - Malih ibn al-Jarrah ibn Malih. ... 573 - And Waki' ibn al-Jarrah.
foot_note:
1. 565 - Muharrar (with two Ra's) on the pattern of Muhammad according to the correct view. Al-Taymi. Matruk (Abandoned) from the seventh [generation]. / T; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/22, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/345, Al-Kamil 6/2434. Ibn Abi Hatim and Ibn Adi named him Muhriz with a Zay; Al-Tahdhib 10/55, Al-Kashif 3/108, Al-Mizan 3/443. Ibn Adi said: Abu Mus'ab said: Muhaziz and Harun are brothers.
566 - Al-Madani. Da'if (Weak), from the sixth [generation]. / Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/226, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/98, Al-Majruhin 3/94, Al-Mizan 4/284, Al-Tahdhib 11/15.
567 - Mentioned by Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 8/271, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/423, and they said: His brother Hilal ibn Abi Dawud narrated from him.
568 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 5/508, and he said: His brother Hilal narrated from him. He has a biography in Ta'jil al-Manfa'ah 280.
569 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 8/210, and Ibn Abi Hatim 9/77. Ibn Abi Hatim said: I asked my father about him? He said: Shaykh (Elder). Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: He heard his brother Marwan ibn Abi Dawud.
570 - Al-Ta'i. Maqbul (Acceptable), from the fifth [generation]. / T; Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/223, Al-Tahdhib 10/261.
571 - Ibn Hibban said in Al-Thiqat 5/492: The brother of Al-Mughirah ibn Sa'd; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/144, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/5.
572 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 8/10, and Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh 8/367, and they said: His brother Waki' narrated from him; Al-Thiqat 9/194.
573 - Al-Ru'asi (with Damma on the Ra, a Hamza, then an unpointed letter [Sin]). Abu Sufyan, Al-Kufi. Thiqah (Trustworthy), Hafiz (Preserver), Abid (Worshipper). From the elders of the ninth [generation]. He died at the end of the year one hundred and ninety-six or the beginning of ninety-seven, and he was seventy years old. / 'A; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/179, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/37, Al-Tahdhib 11/123.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
574 - Mansur ibn Wardan. ... 575 - And Musa ibn Wardan.
The Letter Nun
576 - Najiyah ibn Ka'b al-Aslami. ... 577 - And Salma bint Ka'b.
The Letter Waw
578 - Al-Walid ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Abi Malik. ... 579 - And Yazid ibn Abd al-Rahman.
foot_note:
1. 574 - Al-Misri, Mawla of Quraysh. Maqbul (Acceptable) from the sixth [generation]. / Tamyiz; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/347, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/179, Al-Thiqat 7/475, Al-Tahdhib 10/316. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Musa ibn Wardan.
575 - Abu Umar, Al-Misri, of Medinan origin. Saduq (Truthful), perhaps he makes mistakes. From the third [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and seventeen, and he was seventy-four years old. / Bukh 4; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 7/297, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/165, Al-Tahdhib 10/376.
576 - Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the third [generation]. / D T S; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/107, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 8/486, Al-Tahdhib 10/399. Al-Bukhari and Ibn Abi Hatim said: The brother of Salma bint Ka'b.
577 - Mentioned by Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 4/351 and he said: The sister of Najiyah ibn Ka'b; Al-Tabaqat 8/495.
578 - Abu al-Abbas, Al-Dimashqi, resident of Kufa, and he may be attributed to his grandfather. Thiqah (Trustworthy) from the fifth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and twenty-five. / T S; Al-Thiqat 5/492, Al-Tahdhib 11/140. Ibn Hibban and Al-Hafiz said: The brother of Yazid.
579 - Al-Dimashqi, the Judge. Saduq (Truthful), perhaps he has delusions (Wahm). From the fourth [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and thirty or after it, and he was more than seventy years old. / D S Q; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/347, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/277, Al-Thiqat 5/542, Al-Tahdhib 11/345. Ibn Hibban said: The brother of Al-Walid ibn Abi Malik.

book_title: Addendum to What Was Missed regarding Brothers and Sisters
publisher: Dar Al-Rayah for Publishing and Distribution, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
text:
The Letter Ya'
580 - Yahya ibn Abd al-Samad ibn Ma'qil. ... 581 - And Yusuf ibn Abd al-Samad. 582 - And Yunus ibn Abd al-Samad. 583 - Yahya ibn Muhammad ibn Tahla'. ... 584 - And Ya'qub ibn Muhammad.
Finished the Addendum on the afternoon of Sunday 11/10/1407
foot_note:
1. 580 - Al-Dhahabi said in Al-Mizan 4/394: He narrated a Munkar (rejected) report from Malik. Ibn Hibban mentioned him in Al-Thiqat 9/252 and said: They are three brothers: Yunus, Yahya, and Yusuf, the sons of Abd al-Samad.
581 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 8/386, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/278.
582 - Mentioned by Al-Bukhari in his Tarikh 8/413, Ibn Abi Hatim in Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/241, and Ibn Hibban in Al-Thiqat 9/289.
583 - Ibn Hibban said in Al-Thiqat 7/606: The brother of Ya'qub ibn Muhammad; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/303, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/184.
584 - Al-Madani. La ba'sa bihi (There is no harm in him/Acceptable). From the elders of the seventh [generation]. He died in the year one hundred and sixty-two. / M; Al-Tarikh Al-Kabir 8/397, Al-Jarh wa Al-Ta'dil 9/214, Al-Tahdhib 11/395. Al-Bukhari said: I see him as the brother of Yahya.
